mapper.select: SELECT a.product_id, b.category_id, a.id AS displayInfoId, c.name AS categoryName, b.description AS productDescription, b.content AS productContent, b.event AS productEvent, a.opening_hours, a.place_name, a.place_lot, a.place_street, a.tel AS telephone, a.homepage, a.email, a.create_date, a.modify_date FROM display_info a INNER JOIN product b ON a.product_id = b.id INNER JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{displayInfoId}
